title: Share Meals and More with your Community
text: What if it was easy to find out what your neighbors have got cooking – and when they’d like to share?  We might all have to be socially distanced, but sharing with each other is a great way to stay connected.  Not a cook?  Offer to pick up an item at the grocery and save your neighbors a trip, or even a creative or outdoor activity.  We can get through this together!
